This is Linda. I got a message you called, so I'm returning your call.
Hi, Linda. Thanks for getting back to me so soon.
The reason I called you was to check and see if our order has been shipped.
Great! I'll need to check the information later.
If you like, I can go over the invoice with you now.
Are you available now to talk about it?
Is it alright if I call you back in an hour?
No problem. Talk to you soon.
